name: Tree's Random Map generator
description:
Expanded version of the map generator made for the 2016 procjam. Upon pressing Enter it will randomly generate a map, find your own application for this. (Press Space to stop generation and R to restart simulation.) The generator will run pretty slow in the middle of the process.

Geographic Features: 

  • 4 biomes (Temperate, Desert, Tundra, Swamp)
  • Mountain chains
  • Rivers
  • Forests
  • Lakes/Oceans
  • Cities/Villages

Feedback/Comments appreciated
